mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id , u.email , u.password , u.nickname , u.reset_token , u.level , u.create_date , u.update_date , p.position_id , p.position_name , i.image_id , i.status AS i_status , i.original_file_name , i.storage_file_name , u_s.user_skill_id , s.skill_id , s.skill_name , pj.project_id , pj.begin_date , pj.end_date , pj.title , pj.status AS project_status FROM user u JOIN image i on u.image_id = u.image_id JOIN position p on p.position_id = u.position_id JOIN user_skill u_s on u_s.user_id = u.user_id JOIN skill s ON s.skill_id = u_s.skill_id JOIN project_member p_m ON u.user_id = p_m.user_id JOIN project_position p_p ON p_m.project_position_id = p_p.project_position_id JOIN project_apply p_a ON p_a.project_position_id = p_p.project_position_id AND p_a.status = 1 JOIN project pj ON pj.project_id = p_p.project_id WHERE u.email = #{email}

SELECT u.user_id , u.email , u.password , u.nickname , u.reset_token , u.level , u.create_date , u.update_date , p.position_id , p.position_name , i.image_id , i.status AS i_status , i.original_file_name , i.storage_file_name , u_s.user_skill_id , s.skill_id , s.skill_name , pj.project_id , pj.begin_date , pj.end_date , pj.title , pj.status AS project_status FROM user u JOIN image i on u.image_id = u.image_id JOIN position p on p.position_id = u.position_id JOIN user_skill u_s on u_s.user_id = u.user_id JOIN skill s ON s.skill_id = u_s.skill_id JOIN project_member p_m ON u.user_id = p_m.user_id JOIN project_position p_p ON p_m.project_position_id = p_p.project_position_id JOIN project_apply p_a ON p_a.project_position_id = p_p.project_position_id AND p_a.status = 1 JOIN project pj ON pj.project_id = p_p.project_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT u.user_id , u.email , u.password , u.nickname , u.reset_token , u.level , u.create_date , u.update_date , p.position_id , p.position_name , i.image_id , i.status , i.original_file_name , i.storage_file_name , u_s.user_skill_id , s.skill_id , s.skill_name FROM user u JOIN image i on u.image_id = u.image_id JOIN position p on p.position_id = u.position_id JOIN user_skill u_s on u_s.user_id = u.user_id JOIN skill s ON s.skill_id = u_s.skill_id WHERE u.reset_token = #{resetToken}
